pr_title: [BEAM-9879] support STRING_AGG function in Beam ZetaSQL

timeline.bodyText:
In fact, I think it was a decision to not handle NULL in string coder.
So the easiest way to move forward is to not include NULL in your test case, and leave a comment to say that STRING_AGG does not handle NULL value
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: Remove this line in the final PR.
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: Ah yes. This should also work.
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText:
Nice. By doing so it becomes a extensible way to define other AGG functions that Calcite does not have.
Glad you figured it out.
timeline.author: amaliujia
